controller

Class AlbumHomeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.Controller
      • controller.AlbumHomeController

  • public class AlbumHomeController
extends Controller
    This class deals with the logic in the albums screen.
    Author:
    Sarah Squillace, Nikita Zala
